solution_line_template: First find how many carrots Maria needs to cut by multiplying the number of potatoes by {carrots_multiplier}: {carrots_multiplier} * {potatoes} = <<{carrots_multiplier}*{potatoes}={carrots}>>{carrots}.
Then find how many onions she needs by multiplying the number of carrots by {onions_multiplier}: {carrots} * {onions_multiplier} = <<{carrots}*{onions_multiplier}={onions}>>{onions}.

Finally, divide the number of onions by {green_beans_divisor} to find the number of green beans she needs {onions} / {green_beans_divisor} = <<{onions}/{green_beans_divisor}={green_beans}>>{green_beans}.
